WHAT IS PPVRIP????
-PPVRips are Pay-Per-View videos which have been recorded from Hotel rooms. PPVRip is a Pay-Per-View video source.
-PPVRips are said to have come from Pay-Per-View sources, but what is interesting is that all these releases are brand new movies which have not yet been released to Screener or DVD but are available to view by Hotel customers.

@shrek23: PPV's / PPVrips are really the same thing.  As for you thinking that HOTEL customers get movies first using PPV, thats not true, ANYONE, home or hotel, that has DTV Satellite service as there Digital TV provider can choose to use the PPV service to watch movies and/or record them to there DVR's. (DTV customers get a DVR as part of the package, it is a NON TIVO DVR however) ANYWAY. . . DTV has some deal with certain movie studios allowing for simultaneous releases on DTV's satellite service and in the theaters at once. This is also being done with other movie studios where a movie gets released to NetFLICKS or BLOCKBUSTER and to DTV's PPV service at the same time as those RENTAL places. In ANY case it isn't some service that is only for hotel customers.

As for the quality of this upload, I said I'd get back for a comment, It is CROPPED, grainy, the sound is not great and I agree, this isn't up to par for IwannaFan2's stuff. Hope a good copy shows up somewhere. This isn't the worst upload of this I have seen, but it's pretty  messed up. PLEASE DON"T CROP!!! Thanks!
